pendingScript.script:
proc1 = ['/bin/bash', '-c', "/usr/bin/git ls-remote --heads https://github.com/xap/xap.git"].execute() proc2 = ['/bin/bash', '-c', "/usr/bin/awk ' { gsub(/refs\\/heads\\//, \"\"); print \$2 }' "].execute() all = proc1 | proc2
choices = all.text return choices.split().toList();
